mapper.select: SELECT info_title as infoTitle, catagory_id as catagoryId, content as content, attachment as attachment, insert_time as insertTime, user_id as userId FROM tb_information_library where info_id=#{value}

SELECT count(1) FROM tb_information_library where 1=1
and info_title like '%${infoTitle}%'
and catagory_id = #{catagoryId}
order by info_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_information_library ( info_title, catagory_id, content, attachment, insert_time, user_id ) VALUES ( #{infoTitle}, #{catagoryId}, #{content}, #{attachment}, now(), #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_information_library SET info_title = #{infoTitle}, catagory_id = #{catagoryId}, content = #{content}, attachment = #{attachment} WHERE info_id = #{infoId}
